item.title: 国际货币基金组织支持向埃及提供 25 亿美元贷款和气候基金
item.description: 国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）批准向埃及提供 25 亿美元的融资；其中约一半将立即支付；这对正在努力摆脱数十年来最严重经济危机的埃及来说是一个鼓舞。【原文：The International Monetary Fund approved $2.5 billion in financing for Egypt — about half of which will be paid out immediately — in a boost for the country seeking to emerge from its worst economic crisis in decades.】

item.title: 达美航空和 Airbnb 因消费者担忧领跌旅游股
item.description: 周二，达美航空公司（Delta Air Lines Inc.【原文：Travel stocks from airlines to cruise lines and online-booking sites are coming under pressure Tuesday after Delta Air Lines Inc. cut its profit forecast, deepening concern over weakening consumer demand and an economic slowdown.】

item.title: 稀土矿商称巴西融资稀缺阻碍行业发展
item.description: Meteoric Resources NL 发现很难为其价值 4.2 亿美元的巴西稀土项目在当地找到融资，这促使这家澳大利亚公司将寻找投资者的范围扩大到南美国家以外。【原文：Meteoric Resources NL is finding it difficult to find local financing for its $420 million rare earth project in Brazil, pushing the Australian firm to expand its search for investors beyond the South American nation.】

item.title: 加拿大卡尼将继续征收关税直至美国承诺自由贸易
item.description: 几天内将接替贾斯汀-特鲁多（Justin Trudeau）出任加拿大总理的马克-卡尼（Mark Carney）表示，加拿大将继续实施贸易报复，直到美国取消自己的关税并致力于自由贸易。【原文：Canada will keep its trade retaliation in place until the US lifts its own tariffs and commits to free trade, said Mark Carney, who will succeed Justin Trudeau as Canada’s prime minister within days.】

item.title: 股市动荡，美国重量级 IPO 计划也显得摇摆不定
item.description: 华尔街正在努力将一批备受期待的公司推向公开市场，但剧烈的波动和残酷的市场抛售有可能阻挡这些公司的发展道路。【原文：Wall Street is working to usher a highly-anticipated group of companies to the public markets, but rampant volatility and a brutal market selloff are threatening to block their path.】

item.title: 彪马警告关税和地缘政治紧张局势将打击 2025 年的销售额
item.description: Puma SE 预测，由于全球贸易关税、货币波动和地缘政治紧张局势，2025 年将再次出现缓慢增长。【原文：Puma SE forecast another slow year of growth in 2025 due to global trade tariffs, currency volatility and geopolitical tensions.】

item.title: 关税打击经济，加拿大央行将降息：决策指南
item.description: 加拿大央行可能在周三的会议上连续第七次降息，因为该国正在为贸易战做准备，除非迅速解决贸易战，否则经济将陷入衰退。【原文：The Bank of Canada is likely to cut interest rates for a seventh straight meeting on Wednesday as the country braces for a trade war that will plunge the economy into recession unless there’s a swift resolution.】

item.title: 凯茜-伍德的粉丝们不顾巨额亏损，向受挫的旗舰 ETF 基金投入 3 亿美元
item.description: 凯茜-伍德（Cathie Wood）的零售粉丝们正蹑手蹑脚地回到她的旗舰产品中，有可能结束长达 14 个月的流失。【原文：Cathie Wood’s retail fans are tiptoeing back into her flagship product, potentially putting an end to a 14-month exodus.】

item.title: 欧洲在动荡的特朗普时代寻求新的太空伙伴关系
item.description: 在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的领导下，欧洲大陆加强了防御，并面临着更加孤立主义的美国，因此欧洲与美国国家航空航天局（NASA）的对应机构正在寻求与一系列其他国家在太空领域建立新的合作伙伴关系。【原文：Europe’s counterpart to NASA is seeking new partnerships in space with a range of other countries as the continent bolsters its defenses and faces a more isolationist US under President Donald Trump.】

item.title: 增长担忧引发抛售，S&P 500 指数将进入调整期
item.description: 由于投资者对经济衰退的担忧与日俱增，他们纷纷抛售风险资产，转而寻求避风港，圣保罗 500 指数（S&P 500 Index）有望在周二收盘时出现调整，这是自 2023 年底以来的首次调整，此前该指数已从 2 月 19 日的高点下跌了 10%。【原文：The S&P 500 Index is on track to close in a correction on Tuesday, its first since late 2023, after dropping 10% from its Feb. 19 high as investors grow increasingly worried about an economic downturn and sell risky assets in favor of safe havens.】

item.title: Lyft 正在开发针对老年乘客的简化版应用程序
item.description: Lyft 公司正在为老年乘客开发一款简化版应用程序，以进一步与竞争对手优步公司（Uber Technologies Inc.【原文：Lyft Inc. is working on a simplified version of its app for elderly riders, part of an effort to further differentiate itself from rival Uber Technologies Inc.】

item.title: X Hit 服务器遭网络攻击 被指缺乏密钥保护
item.description: 据网络安全分析师称，导致埃隆-马斯克的 X 公司瘫痪的网络攻击针对的是没有充分防止恶意流量的服务器。【原文：A cyberattack that brought down Elon Musk’s X targeted servers that were insufficiently protected from malicious traffic, according to cybersecurity analysts.】

item.title: 巴西基础设施公司聘请四家银行开展销售狂潮
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，交通基础设施运营商 CCR SA 雇用了四家银行，帮助其出售拉丁美洲的 20 个机场和巴西的五个城市交通资产。【原文：Transport infrastructure operator CCR SA hired four banks to help on the sale of 20 airports across Latin America and five urban mobility assets in Brazil, according to people familiar to the matter.】

item.title: 罗马尼亚法院维持极右翼分子乔治斯库的选举禁令
item.description: 罗马尼亚宪法法院维持了禁止总统候选人卡林-乔治斯库（Calin Georgescu）参加 5 月大选的决定，结束了这场使罗马尼亚陷入共产主义垮台以来最大政治危机的竞选。【原文：Romania’s constitutional court upheld a decision banning presidential front-runner Calin Georgescu from May’s election, ending a bid that plunged the country into the biggest political crisis since the fall of communism.】

item.title: 众议院共和党采取行动阻止对特朗普关税的潜在挑战
item.description: 在美国总统加强与加拿大的贸易战之际，众议院共和党人将于周二采取行动，阻止民主党人就唐纳德-特朗普的关税问题强行进行痛苦的投票。【原文：House Republicans will move Tuesday to block Democrats from forcing a painful vote on Donald Trump’s tariffs as the president amps up the US trade war with Canada.】

item.title: 安大略省省长称必要时将削减对美电力出口
item.description: 安大略省省长重申，在唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统表示将把加拿大钢铝关税加倍至 50%后，他愿意关闭对美国的电力出口，以向白宫传递信息。【原文：Ontario’s premier repeated that he’s willing to shut off electricity exports to the US to send a message to the White House after President Donald Trump said he’ll double tariffs on Canadian steel and aluminum to 50%.】

item.title: 尽管希望得到缓和，但英国仍在为特朗普的钢铁关税做准备
item.description: 英国政府预计将受到美国总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）征收钢铝关税的打击，尽管英方仍希望与美国进行积极的贸易谈判，以便在第 11 个小时获得缓和。【原文：The UK government is expecting to get hit by President Donald Trump’s steel and aluminum tariffs, even as the British side holds out hope that positive trade negotiations with the US could result in an 11th-hour reprieve.】

item.title: 红杉合伙人谈 Murati 的人工智能初创公司："我们正在与她交谈
item.description: 红杉资本（Sequoia Capital）合伙人林毅夫（Alfred Lin）表示，该公司已与 OpenAI 前首席技术官米拉-穆拉提（Mira Murati）就其新初创公司的一轮融资进行了接触。【原文：Sequoia Capital partner Alfred Lin said the firm has been in touch with former OpenAI Chief Technology Officer Mira Murati about her new startup’s funding round — a closely held deal that’s captivated the attention of much of Silicon Valley.】

item.title: TC 能源公司首席执行官认为得克萨斯州南部-Tuxpan 输油管道将加速发展
item.description: TC 能源公司首席执行官 Francois Poirier 在接受采访时表示，随着东南门户管道于 5 月 1 日投入使用，TC 能源公司从得克萨斯州向墨西哥输送天然气的 Sur de Texas-Tuxpan 管道预计将在未来几个月内投入运营。【原文：TC Energy’s Sur de Texas-Tuxpan pipeline that transports natural gas from Texas to Mexico is expected to ramp up in coming months as the Southeast Gateway conduit starts service on May 1, Chief Executive Officer Francois Poirier said in an interview.】

item.title: 伊拉克寻求首批液化天然气，供应问题迫在眉睫
item.description: 由于面临伊朗供应的不确定性，伊拉克首次寻求购买液化天然气货物，这增加了电力短缺的可能性。【原文：Iraq is looking to buy cargoes of liquefied natural gas for the first time as it faces uncertainty over supply from Iran, raising the prospect of electricity shortages.】

item.title: 摩根大通的米歇尔认为新兴市场蕴藏 "宝石"，美国例外论达到顶峰
item.description: 摩根大通资产管理公司（JPMorgan Asset Management）将赌注押在从拉丁美洲到东欧的发展中市场上，因为世界最大经济体的降温迹象迫使投资者将目光投向美国以外的地区。【原文：JPMorgan Asset Management is betting on developing markets from Latin America to Eastern Europe as signs of cooling in the world’s largest economy force investors to look beyond the US.】

item.title: 尼日利亚大型炼油厂扩建，丹格特购买更多外国石油
item.description: 尼日利亚的丹格特炼油厂正在从世界各地汲取原料，以增加其国内交付量，因为该大型工厂正在逐步扩大规模，从而改变了该地区的进出口前景。【原文：Nigeria’s Dangote refinery is drawing feedstock from across the world to add to its domestic deliveries as the mega-plant gradually ramps up, altering the region’s import and export outlook.】

item.title: Alphabet 旗下 Waymo 将在硅谷提供自动驾驶汽车服务
item.description: Alphabet 公司旗下的自动驾驶汽车公司 Waymo 表示，它将开始在加利福尼亚州山景城总部附近的少数几个城市运送乘客。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s self-driving car firm, Waymo, said it will begin transporting passengers in a handful of cities near its Mountain View, California, headquarters.】

item.title: 特朗普呼吁对加拿大征收新关税，油菜籽创三个月新低
